home.opengraph.description.message: An Innovation Lab based in Bangkok, Thailand. We nurture and experiment with cutting-edge technology.

projects.opengraph.description.message: Exploring projects that we are experimenting with and browse more to discover your new adventure!

services.opengraph.description.message: Fascinated with cutting-edge technology? Discover our services and see how we can connect the dot together.

about.opengraph.description.message: Tong Hua Labs is an Innovation and Creative Lab under Tong Hua Holding Public Company Limited. Our lab was established to serve as a playground for experimenting with emerging technologies.

contactus.opengraph.description.message: Stay connected. Contact us about anything related to our labs. We'll do our best to get back to you as soon as possible.

home.introduction.description.message: Driving digital innovation through a culture of experimentation

feature.description.message: We build experiments, measure results, and learn from our successes and failures. We are not afraid to fail. We fail fast, fail often, but always fail forward.

feature.caption.message: Without experimentation, there is no innovation.

our.labs.description.message: Explore our various themed labs below:

lab.word.meaning.message: A place where the magic happens.

labs.first.description.message: Research and development of emerging technologies that will shape next-generation media.

labs.second.description.message: Research, develop and invest in decentralized technology that will drive the future of the internet.

services.first.description.message: We invest in, nurture and commercialize cutting-edge technology startups — mainly Web3-related projects for now. Startups of all stages and sizes are welcome to apply.

services.second.description.message: Are you working on an open-source project? At Tong Hua Labs, we depend on open source every day. To give back to the awesome open source community, we are sponsoring projects that we believe will make a difference. Get in touch and let us know what you're building!

services.third.description.message: We are actively seeking new partnership opportunities and welcome conversations regarding collaboration. Let's grab a coffee and see what we can build together!

services.fourth.description.message: Let your voice be heard by the right audience through our distribution channels and partners.

about.tonghualabs.description.message: is an Innovation and Creativity Lab under Tong Hua Holding Public Company Limited. We are located on the historic Chareonkrung road in Bangkok, Thailand — The first modern road built in Thailand. Our lab was established to serve as a playground for experimenting with emerging technologies to see how they can be applied to solve real-world problems.

about.our.mission.description.message: TO NURTURE INNOVATION AND CUTTING-EDGE TECHNOLOGY

about.our.mission.sub.description.message: Our company traces its roots back to 1960 when the Internet wasn't a thing. Throughout the years, we have experienced the development of many life-changing technologies and the downfall of many. We started as a Chinese Newspaper Company and expanded into a diversified business group active in Media, Technology, and Finance. Now, we are committed to using the extensive knowledge and cross-industry experience we've accumulated over the last half-decade in fostering the next big thing that matters.

contact.sub.description.message: We'll do our best to get back to you as soon as possible.

contact.address.description.message: 877-881 Charoen Krung Rd, Talat Noi, Samphanthawong, Bangkok 10100, Thailand
